title: Improve javadocs for GeoCircle implementations
description:
Hi Karl Wright,

Now that there are two different ways to construct circles, it would be good to update javadocs to hellp users decide which one they want to use. I am providing a patch with my unserstanding of the circles but please feel free to modify it.

Thanks!

comments.content: Patch attached. One important thing it contains is that I have renamed the class variable cuffOffAngle to radius in GeoExactCircle.
comments.author: Ignacio Vera
